com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options

Class OptionGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options.OptionGenerator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder<com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.ContainerViewElement>

    public class OptionGenerator
extends Object
implements com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.ViewElementBuilder<com.foreach.across.modules.web.ui.elements.ContainerViewElement>

    Wrapper that generates the children of an OptionsFormElementBuilder. Requires an OptionIterableBuilder that is responsible for creating the initial collection of OptionFormElementBuilders.

    When the setSorted(boolean)

    property is true, the options will be sorted by label and text in the resulting set.

    In case of a resulting SelectFormElement an empty option will be added if none is selected or if the element is not required. The empty option can be overridden (and set to null) using setEmptyOption(OptionFormElementBuilder).

    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
    See Also:
    OptionsFormElementBuilder, OptionIterableBuilder

        public void setSelfOptionIncluded(boolean selfOptionIncluded)
        In case of options that are the same type as the entity being built, should the entity itself be provided as an option. Default value is false.
        Parameters:
        selfOptionIncluded - True when entity itself should be included.
